statements: SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources;
SELECT source_name, credibility_score FROM misinformation_sources WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT id, source_name FROM misinformation_sources ORDER BY credibility_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources WHERE credibility_score >= 0.5 AND flagged = FALSE;
SELECT source_name AS name, credibility_score AS score FROM misinformation_sources WHERE credibility_score < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources WHERE flagged = TRUE ORDER BY credibility_score DESC;
SELECT source_name, credibility_score FROM misinformation_sources WHERE credibility_score >= 0.5;
SELECT source_name, credibility_score FROM misinformation_sources WHERE flagged = FALSE ORDER BY credibility_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources ORDER BY source_name;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources WHERE credibility_score IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources;
SELECT source_name, is_verified FROM misinformation_sources;
SELECT id, source_name, is_verified FROM misinformation_sources WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT source_name FROM misinformation_sources WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM flagged_entries WHERE flag_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT source_name, is_verified FROM misinformation_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, flag_reason FROM misinformation_sources JOIN flagged_entries ON misinformation_sources.id = flagged_entries.source_id WHERE flag_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, source_name FROM misinformation_sources WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources WHERE id = 2 AND is_verified = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM MisinformationSources;
SELECT source_name, country FROM MisinformationSources WHERE category='Health';
SELECT * FROM Articles ORDER BY article_title DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM Articles WHERE source_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT flag_date, flag_reason FROM Flags WHERE flag_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY flag_date ASC;
SELECT source_id, source_name, category FROM MisinformationSources WHERE country='USA';
SELECT article_id, article_title, source_id FROM Articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Flags WHERE flag_reason='Misleading content' AND flag_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT source_name, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM MisinformationSources JOIN Articles ON MisinformationSources.source_id = Articles.source_id GROUP BY source_name ORDER BY article_count DESC;

SELECT source_name, article_title, flag_reason FROM MisinformationSources JOIN Articles ON MisinformationSources.source_id = Articles.source_id JOIN Flags ON Articles.article_id = Flags.article_id WHERE Flags.flag_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY source_name ASC, flag_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM misinformation_sources WHERE flagged = TRUE
SELECT id, source_name, source_type FROM misinformation_sources WHERE source_type = 'social media'
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources WHERE source_name LIKE 'C%'
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources WHERE flagged = TRUE ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM misinformation_sources WHERE source_type = 'news outlet' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources WHERE source_type = 'website' AND flagged = FALSE;
SELECT source_name, flagged FROM misinformation_sources WHERE source_type = 'social media';
SELECT id, source_name, source_type, flagged FROM misinformation_sources ORDER BY id ASC, source_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM misinformation_sources WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT comment_text, flag_reason FROM comments WHERE flag_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources WHERE flagged = true;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT articles.article_title, comments.comment_text FROM articles JOIN comments ON articles.article_id = comments.article_id;
SELECT users.username, articles.article_title, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN comments ON users.user_id = comments.user_id JOIN articles ON comments.article_id = articles.article_id;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_sources ORDER BY source_type DESC, source_name ASC;
